directions: Combine water, mushrooms, celery, onions, carrots, bouquet garni, garlic, bay leaves, salt, and pepper in a large soup pot and bring to a boil, about 5 minutes. Reduce to a gentle simmer and cook until reduced by 1/2, 45 to 50 minutes.
Strain stock into a jar, discard vegetables, and your stock is good to go.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Mushroom Broth
